process.name: OnProcess
process.description: Updates multilayer soil temperature and related energy terms over intraday steps using net radiation, boundary layer conductance, and a Thomas tridiagonal solver.

inputs.name: weather_MeanT
inputs.description: Daily mean air temperature

inputs.name: weather_Tav
inputs.description: Long-term average air temperature

inputs.name: weather_Amp
inputs.description: Annual temperature amplitude

inputs.name: weather_Latitude
inputs.description: Site latitude

inputs.name: weather_Radn
inputs.description: Daily incoming shortwave radiation

inputs.name: weather_AirPressure
inputs.description: Air pressure

inputs.name: weather_MaxT
inputs.description: Daily maximum air temperature

inputs.name: weather_MinT
inputs.description: Daily minimum air temperature

inputs.name: weather_Wind
inputs.description: Wind speed at instrument height

inputs.name: waterBalance_SW
inputs.description: Volumetric soil water content by layer

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eo
inputs.description: Potential evaporation from reference surface

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eos
inputs.description: Potential soil evaporation

inputs.name: waterBalance_Salb
inputs.description: Soil surface albedo (fraction)

inputs.name: waterBalance_Es
inputs.description: Actual soil evaporation rate

inputs.name: microClimate_CanopyHeight
inputs.description: Canopy height

inputs.name: physical_Thickness
inputs.description: Soil layer thickness

inputs.name: physical_BD
inputs.description: Bulk density by layer

inputs.name: physical_Rocks
inputs.description: Rock fragment content by layer

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSand
inputs.description: Sand fraction by layer

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSilt
inputs.description: Silt fraction by layer

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeClay
inputs.description: Clay fraction by layer

inputs.name: organic_Carbon
inputs.description: Organic carbon content by layer

inputs.name: clock_Today_DayOfYear
inputs.description: Day of year

inputs.name: instrumHeight
inputs.description: Configured instrument height (overrides default if > 0)

inputs.name: InitialValues
inputs.description: Optional initial soil temperature profile (starting from topsoil node)

inputs.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
inputs.description: Depth at which temperature is held constant in initialization

inputs.name: timestep_seconds
inputs.description: Duration of a day in seconds used for internal stepping

inputs.name: airNode
inputs.description: Index of air node

inputs.name: surfaceNode
inputs.description: Index of soil surface node

inputs.name: topsoilNode
inputs.description: Index of topsoil node

inputs.name: numPhantomNodes
inputs.description: Number of phantom nodes appended below soil profile

inputs.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
inputs.description: Hour of day for maximum air temperature

inputs.name: instrumentHeight
inputs.description: Current instrument height used for wind and conductance calculations

inputs.name: numLayers
inputs.description: Number of soil layers

inputs.name: numNodes
inputs.description: Total number of soil nodes (layers + phantom nodes)

inputs.name: thickness
inputs.description: Node-associated layer thickness including phantom layers

inputs.name: nodeDepth
inputs.description: Depth of nodes

inputs.name: bulkDensity
inputs.description: Bulk density profile including phantom nodes

inputs.name: soilWater
inputs.description: Current volumetric soil water by node/layer

inputs.name: carbon
inputs.description: Organic carbon by layer including phantom nodes

inputs.name: rocks
inputs.description: Rock fragment content by layer including phantom nodes

inputs.name: sand
inputs.description: Sand fraction by layer including phantom nodes

inputs.name: silt
inputs.description: Silt fraction by layer including phantom nodes

inputs.name: clay
inputs.description: Clay fraction by layer including phantom nodes

inputs.name: maxSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily maximum soil temperature by node

inputs.name: minSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily minimum soil temperature by node

inputs.name: aveSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily average soil temperature by node

inputs.name: volSpecHeatSoil
inputs.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil at nodes

inputs.name: soilTemp
inputs.description: Current soil temperature profile at nodes

inputs.name: morningSoilTemp
inputs.description: Soil temperature snapshot near 5:00 local time at nodes

inputs.name: newTemperature
inputs.description: Workspace array for updated temperatures at nodes

inputs.name: thermalConductivity
inputs.description: Soil thermal conductivity at nodes (plus air node for boundary conductance)

inputs.name: heatStorage
inputs.description: Effective heat storage per node per time step

inputs.name: thermalConductance
inputs.description: Thermal conductance between nodes (includes air boundary when used)

inputs.name: soilRoughnessHeight
inputs.description: Bare soil roughness length used to bound canopy height

inputs.name: boundaryLayerConductance
inputs.description: Daily average boundary layer conductance over soil surface

inputs.name: airTemperature
inputs.description: Current air temperature used for timestep computations

inputs.name: maxTempYesterday
inputs.description: Yesterday's max air temperature used in diurnal interpolation before minimum time

inputs.name: minTempYesterday
inputs.description: Yesterday's min air temperature used in diurnal interpolation before minimum time

inputs.name: netRadiation
inputs.description: Net radiation to soil for the last intraday step

inputs.name: canopyHeight
inputs.description: Current canopy height used in conductance (derived from microClimate_CanopyHeight and roughness)

inputs.name: nu
inputs.description: Implicitness factor for the Thomas solver

inputs.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
inputs.description: Source selection for boundary layer conductance (calc or constant)

inputs.name: netRadiationSource
inputs.description: Source selection for net radiation (calc)

inputs.name: pom
inputs.description: Particle density of organic matter

inputs.name: ps
inputs.description: Particle density of soil minerals

inputs.name: soilConstituentNames
inputs.description: List of soil constituent names considered in heat property calculations

outputs.name: instrumentHeight
outputs.description: Updated instrument height considering canopy height

outputs.name: soilWater
outputs.description: Updated volumetric soil water profile (copied from waterBalance_SW)

outputs.name: canopyHeight
outputs.description: Derived canopy height used in conductance

outputs.name: volSpecHeatSoil
outputs.description: Volumetric specific heat at nodes for the current day

outputs.name: thermalConductivity
outputs.description: Soil thermal conductivity at nodes (air node holds boundary conductance)

outputs.name: thermalConductance
outputs.description: Inter-node thermal conductance used by Thomas solver

outputs.name: heatStorage
outputs.description: Node heat storage term for current internal time step

outputs.name: soilTemp
outputs.description: Updated soil temperature profile at nodes

outputs.name: minSoilTemp
outputs.description: Minimum soil temperature observed during the day at each node

outputs.name: maxSoilTemp
outputs.description: Maximum soil temperature observed during the day at each node

outputs.name: aveSoilTemp
outputs.description: Average soil temperature accumulated over intraday steps

outputs.name: boundaryLayerConductance
outputs.description: Average boundary layer conductance over the day

outputs.name: netRadiation
outputs.description: Net radiation to soil for last intraday step

outputs.name: morningSoilTemp
outputs.description: Soil temperatures near 5:00 stored for reporting/diagnostics

outputs.name: maxTempYesterday
outputs.description: Updated yesterday max air temperature for next day diurnal interpolation

outputs.name: minTempYesterday
outputs.description: Updated yesterday min air temperature for next day diurnal interpolation

functions.name: Divide
functions.description: Safe division that returns errVal when denominator is zero.

functions.name: ValuesInArray
functions.description: Checks if an array contains any valid (non-missing) value.

functions.name: Sum
functions.description: Sums values between start and end indices, skipping sentinel 999999.

functions.name: Zero
functions.description: Sets all elements of an array to 0.0.

functions.name: ToCumThickness
functions.description: Converts layer thicknesses to cumulative thickness.

functions.name: kelvinT
functions.description: Converts Celsius to Kelvin.

functions.name: longWaveRadn
functions.description: Computes longwave radiation using Stefan–Boltzmann law.

functions.name: airDensity
functions.description: Computes air density from temperature and pressure.

functions.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Returns specific heat value for the named soil constituent.

functions.name: ThermalConductance
functions.description: Returns conductance-related value per constituent (placeholder behavior).

functions.name: volumetricFractionRocks
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks in a layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of organic matter in a layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionSand
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of sand in a layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionSilt
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of silt in a layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionClay
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of clay in a layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionWater
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of water in a layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionIce
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of ice in a layer (returns 0.0).

functions.name: volumetricFractionAir
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of air in a layer.

functions.name: shapeFactor
functions.description: Computes geometric shape factor for constituents (placeholder behavior).

functions.name: mapLayer2Node
functions.description: Maps layer properties to nodes by depth-weighted averaging.

functions.name: calcLayerTemperature
functions.description: Computes temperature at depth using a harmonic diurnal formulation.

functions.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
functions.description: Computes soil surface temperature from mean/max T and albedo-scaled radiation.

functions.name: doNetRadiation
functions.description: Distributes daily solar radiation into intraday steps and estimates cloud fraction and vapor parameter.

functions.name: interpolateNetRadiation
functions.description: Computes intraday net radiation at the soil surface (shortwave + longwave).

functions.name: interpolateTemperature
functions.description: Sinusoidal diurnal interpolation of air temperature between min and max.

functions.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Computes volumetric specific heat at nodes from constituents and maps to nodes.

functions.name: doThermalConductivity
functions.description: Computes effective thermal conductivity at nodes from constituent properties.

functions.name: doThomas
functions.description: Thomas tridiagonal solver advancing soil temperatures with surface energy balance.

functions.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
functions.description: Computes aerodynamic + radiative boundary layer conductance over the soil.

functions.name: calcSoilTemperature
functions.description: Initial seasonal soil temperature profile using a damped sinusoid.
